com.irurueta.server.commons.email

Class AWSMailSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.EmailSender<com.amazonaws.services.simpleemail.model.Message>
      • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.AWSMailSender

  • public class AWSMailSender
extends EmailSender<com.amazonaws.services.simpleemail.model.Message>
    Class to send emails using Amazon Web Services (AWS) SES.

        private volatile long mCheckQuotaAfterMillis
